thread.section_title: Hotel La Lanterne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: La Lanterne
thread.title_full: La Lanterne - Review of Hotel La Lanterne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Fischels
title: La Lanterne
text: The location is excellent for anyone who wishes to stay in that neighbourhood. It is a small hotel in which every detail is remarkably esthetic, tasteful, and pleasant. Service is friendly and efficient. Breakfast is all right. The rooms are remarkably quiet. There are two interrelated problems: the rooms are very small and one pays a lot for such tiny rooms.
